participant_1.background:
I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
i am pursuing my law degree.
I like to be alone, but I love my baby.
I'm afraid I'll be unable to keep up with my busy schedule.
I spend my free time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I enjoy crocheting in my spare time.
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to today?
Hi, how are you? Today is a good day! I'm planning on practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
That sounds fun! I'm not that much into music, but I do like going to concerts with my boss.
I love music! I play the piano, but I'm not very good at it. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country. Do you have any hobbies?
I crochet in my spare time. I also love to cook, but I don't have much time for it these days.
I love to cook too! I'm always trying new recipes. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make fresh pasta. I also love to make soups and stews.
I love soups and stews too! I make a really good chicken noodle soup.
That sounds delicious! I'm going to have to try that recipe.
You should! It's really easy to make.
No problem! Have a great day!
